titles.title: Providing for enclosing the galleries of the House of Representatives with a transparent and substantial material.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 5/6/1999--Introduced. Requires the Architect of the Capitol to: (1) enclose the galleries of the House of Representatives with a transparent and substantial material; and (2) install equipment so that the House floor proceedings will be clearly audible in them. Authorizes appropriations.
